## enviroCaR 
### An R Package

Nikolai Gorte & Simon Schoemaker

## Import single Track
```{r setup, echo=FALSE,error=FALSE,message=FALSE, results='asis'}
require(enviroCaR)
require(fuzzyMM)
require(map3d)
require(knitr)
require(spacetime)
knit_hooks$set(rgl = hook_rgl)
```
```{r}
track <- importSingleTrack("https://envirocar.org/api/stable", "53b5228ee4b01607fa566b78")

```
